name: Flock Together (MathewHD, EllisFr, Timon Herzog)
description:
This was made for my seventh game jam participation and the GMTK game jam. The only restriction for this game jam was making a game around the theme Joined Together. The game was made in Unity.

The team:

Mathew - Programming.

Timon - Programming, 3D modelling.

Ellis - Music & SFX, playtesting.
